settings.subtitle: The inventor of biscuit joinery. Lamello tools and connector systems are engineered in Switzerland and trusted by joiners, cabinet makers, and woodworkers worldwide.

settings.title: 80 Years of Swiss Engineering
settings.paragraph_1: Hermann Steiner invented the biscuit joining system in 1944, and Lamello has led the industry ever since. Every tool is designed and built at their headquarters in Bubendorf, Switzerland.
settings.paragraph_2: From the original biscuit joiners to the latest Clamex and Invis connector systems, Lamello tools are built to last and engineered for precision.

settings.title: Shop Fitting
settings.description: Retail displays and exhibition stands that can be assembled, disassembled, and reconfigured.

settings.title: Kitchen Fitting
settings.description: Fast carcass assembly with invisible connections. No edge drilling with Cabineo.

settings.title: Bespoke Furniture
settings.description: STORY Design Amsterdam creates sustainable flat-pack furniture for easy transport and on-site assembly.

settings.title: Commercial Furniture
settings.description: Hüba in Lucerne used over 30,000 Clamex connectors for their tubular metal furniture system — saving 25% assembly time.

settings.title: Cabinet Making
settings.description: Traditional joinery with modern efficiency. Biscuit joints for alignment and strength.

settings.title: Who Uses Lamello?
settings.subtitle: From bespoke furniture makers to large-scale commercial projects

settings.title: Cabineo X
settings.description: The revolutionary cabinet connector that doubles as a shelf support. No edge drilling required — simply drill into the panel face and insert.
settings.feature_2: Connector and shelf support in one

settings.title: LC P-16
settings.description: Purpose-built for lightweight panels. Join honeycomb, foam-core, and composite panels without concealed timber edges — the P-System anchors directly into the surface layers.

settings.title: New from Lamello
settings.subtitle: The latest joining solutions from Swiss engineering

settings.title: Faster Assembly
settings.description: Save up to 25% assembly time compared to traditional cam fittings. No alignment issues, no callbacks.

settings.title: Glued & Clamped
settings.description: Tenso self-clamping connectors create permanent joints in under a minute. No clamps, no presses, no waiting . Apply glue, insert and walk away.

settings.title: Tensile Strength
settings.description: Each P-System connector withstands up to 80 kg (170 lb) of pull force. Form-locking anchorage across large surface areas for rock-solid joints.

settings.title: Minimum Thickness
settings.description: P-10 connectors work with materials as thin as 12 mm. Tenso, Clamex, and Divario options for panels from 12 mm to solid timber. One system scales to every job.

settings.title: Spare Parts Guaranteed
settings.description: Lamello machines are built to last. Spare parts available for up to 15 years, with a 3-year manufacturer warranty as standard on all biscuit joiners.

settings.title: Swiss Heritage
settings.description: 80+ years of wood joining innovation from Bubendorf, Switzerland. Every tool designed, engineered and built in-house to Swiss precision standards.

settings.title: Why Professionals Choose Lamello
settings.subtitle: Trusted by furniture makers, kitchen fitters, and joiners worldwide

settings.title: Biscuit Joiners
settings.description: The original and best. Zeta, Classic, and Top models for cabinet making and joinery.

settings.title: Connector Systems
settings.description: Clamex, Tenso, Invis Mx, Cabineo. Detachable and invisible connectors for furniture.

settings.title: Biscuits & Accessories
settings.description: Original Lamello biscuits, blades, dust bags, and genuine spare parts.

settings.title: Explore Lamello Products
settings.subtitle: From precision biscuit joiners to innovative connector systems

settings.title: The Zeta P2 in Action
settings.description: See how the Zeta P2's pivoting faceplate, adjustable depth settings, and integrated dust extraction make it the professional's choice for biscuit joinery.

settings.title: Need Help Choosing?
settings.subtitle: Our team knows Lamello inside out. Call for expert advice.
